data.actual_result: It resolves the mention in the edit box
data.expected_result: It shouldn't resolve the mention until you have successfully edited message, rather than doing it in the edit modal
data.short_description: When editing in a mention with an ID, it autoresolves in the edit box, which will break more if you do in an another server to do a cross-server mention
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a normal message - Then edit the message and mention something via <@ > or <# > and so on - Observe how it automatically resolves
